ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope........can t take any bag that s on your person.  Only items equipped, and not weapons that you have equipped either.  However, if they have the Disarm
ygData.messageBody:
Nope........can't take any bag that's on your person. Only items equipped,
and not weapons that you have equipped either. However, if they have the
Disarm skill, your weapon will go into your inventory list. And if you
have an open main slot, and they kill you, they can get it then.




"IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@...> on 04/05/2001 05:50:36
PM
